title: Great food great view
text: Really high quality food for reasonable prices. This is a must visit if you go to Lisbon. The scallops were great!

title: Stunning quiet beach
text: We spent 2 weeks in the Greek islands and this was the best beach experience we had. Quiet beach warm clear water and plenty of loungers. Donâ€™t go later than early October though as it is the very end of season

title: Probably the best hotel I've ever stayed in
text: We stayed at this hotel shortly after it opened and it was amazing. The hotel used to be a palace and many of the original features have been kept. The inside of the hotel has been completed to the highest standard, the bed was very comfortable and the room was decorated very tastefully. Only problem was the downstairs bar was really quiet which made it feel a little strange.

title: Overrated bar
text: We went to this bar with high expectations but were disappointed by the food and drink. The burger was very dry and, food and drinks were both expensive and the service was slow

title: Best coffee shop in Athens
text: We had a really good coffee, cake and sandwich on a hot day before we visited the acropolis. The shade was much needed and the service was really friendly.

title: Lots of better places locally
text: Overall disappointing meal, the food was cheap but the quality of what we were served was disappointing. The moussaka, in particular, was not good and was served lukewarm with a white sauce on top with a jelly consistency. warm

title: Nice Italian
text: Good Italian food, the chicken dish was particularly nice. The service was excellent with a friendly waitress. The main downside was the number of cats around the outside tables.

title: Beautiful room with a great view
text: Hotel was a 10min walk from the town centre and really handy for the ferry port. The room we had was on the first floor with a balcony overlooking the sea. The room itself had a 4 poster bed and an ornate high ceiling. The only thing that could have been better were the breakfasts although these were served on a great terrace overlooking the sea

title: Must see in Athens
text: Best to do early in the morning as there is a lot of walking to do but if you're going to Athens you can't miss it

title: Great view from the rooftop
text: Everything about the stay was excellent, easy to get to the hotel on public transport with the nearest station about 2 minutes away. The room was large, clean and well equipped with a coffee machine. The highlight of was the view from the rooftop bar which is one of the best in Athens with sunset views of the Parthenon and a really nice pool.
